did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: George G. Gyrisco papers, [ca. 1940]-1984.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, notes, reports, newsletters, photographs, and other files.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files on graduate students and undergraduate advisees; general correspondence and subject files relating to entomology; research and conference notes and reports, files on insect control research and recommendations, and extension newsletters. Includes photographs of people and projects in Gyrisco's career.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: George Gordon Gyrisco, born 1920, received his Ph.D from Cornell University in 1947.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files on graduate students and undergraduate advisees; general correspondence and subject files relating to entomology; research and conference notes and reports, files on insect control research and recommendations, and extension newsletters. Includes photographs of people and projects in Gyrisco's career.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences. Dept. of Entomology.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Files of graduate students and undergraduate advisees (Box 10, 11, 12), and personal correspondence (Box 29) may be used and reproduced until 2030 only with the permission of the Head of the Department of Entomology at Cornell University.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: George G. Gyrisco papers, #21-23-2228. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Northeast Aerial Applicator's Conference, 18 vols., 1966-1983 ; NYS Insecticide and Fungicide Recommendations, 1978-1981
